homeAddress.street1: 123 Very Long Street Name That Definitely Exceeds The 40 Character Limit

expected_behavior.cityOfBirth: SHOULD FILL - 'San Francisco' is 13 chars (under 20 limit)

expected_behavior.city: SHOULD BE SKIPPED - 'Los Angeles Metropolitan Area' is 30 chars (likely exceeds 20 limit) - RED BORDER
